text: Kallur is a census town in Khammam district in the Indian state of Telangana. ==Geography== Kallur is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Kallur It has an average elevation of 104 metres (341 feet). Very near to Andhra Pradesh state capital Amaravathi, and vijayawada. ==Demographics== India census, Kallur had a population of 52,880. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Kallur has an average literacy rate of 43%, lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 54%, and female literacy is 32%. In Kallur, 14% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Khammam district
title: Kallur, Khammam district
